work.businessImpactStatement: Clear evidence of business value and ROI through measurable outcomes and sustainable technical innovation.

bnc-analytical-foundation.description: Led team of 7 engineers building robust analytical pipelines for enterprise banking. Created innovative PySpark QA framework that became the standard for data quality across the analytics platform.
keyAchievements: Led team of 7 analysts and data engineers delivering critical analytical infrastructure
Developed PySpark library achieving 30% error reduction in production pipelines
Increased data processing efficiency by 25% through optimized pipeline architecture
Automated QA tests reducing testing time by 40% while improving coverage

businessImpact.description: 30% reduction in data processing errors in production pipelines through innovative PySpark QA framework (€65K annual labor savings)
25% increase in data processing efficiency across analytical pipelines, freeing 3 hours/day of engineering time (€65K+ annual value)
40% faster QA testing through automation, reducing release cycles from days to hours

technicalInnovation: Advanced data quality monitoring and alerting
Scalable analytical architecture handling billions of records
